commands.name: kit list
commands.description: Lists active kits on the server in the console.

commands.name: kit add
commands.description: Adds an item to the kit, or creates a new kit if no kits with your chosen name exist. Condition options are numerical values, container options include "Main", "Belt", and "Wear".
commands.effect: Creates a kit called NewKit1, adds an AK rifle to it, and places that item in a player’s hotbar when active.

commands.name: kit remove
commands.description: Removes an item from the kit, deletes it if empty.
commands.effect: Removes the Assault Rifle from NewKit1. If the kit is empty it then deletes the kit completely.

commands.name: kit delete
commands.description: Deletes a kit, regardless of how many items are in it.

commands.name: kit edit changename
commands.description: Changes the defined kit name to a new name.

commands.name: kit edit addgroup
commands.description: Adds the defined kit to spawn for all users in the defined group.
commands.effect: Makes NewKit1 appear in the inventory by default for all VIP tier server users.

commands.name: kit edit removegroup
commands.description: Removes the defined kit from spawning for all users in the defined group.
commands.effect: Makes NewKit1 no longer appear in the inventory by default for VIP tier server users.

commands.name: kit givetogroup
commands.description: Gives a defined kit to a defined group once.
commands.effect: Gives NewKit1 to all VIP tier players' inventories. Note: the kit will be lost upon dying.

commands.name: kit givetoplayer
commands.description: Gives a defined kit to a defined player once.
commands.effect: Gives NewKit1 to player with the gamertag 2StageFright, it will appear in their inventories. Note: the kit will be lost upon dying.

commands.name: kit givetoall
commands.description: Gives a defined kit to all players once.
commands.effect: Gives NewKit1 to all players, it will appear in their inventories. Note: the kit will be lost upon dying.

commands.name: kit info
commands.description: Provides info about the given kit.
commands.effect: Assuming the kit "NewKit1" includes an Assault Rifle and Metal Facemask, returns the following information.
